It is a common idiom used in Hindi to describe a situation where someone is distributing something, but they are unaware of the consequences of their actions. The English idiom "Giving someone a fish with a hook in it" is the closest match to this definition. It implies that the person giving the fish is unaware that it has a hook in it, which could cause harm to the recipient.
